name: iPhoto Library File
summary: Learn about .IPHOTO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Apple iPhoto is used for editing and organizing photos. You can organize by date or event, edit photos, and import video, although you cannot edit video. It comes standard with Apple iLife.
NOTE: iPhoto was discontinued and replaced by Photos in 2015.

description: File created by iPhoto, an image organizer; contains information from imported photos such as image size and format; located in subfolders of iPhoto.
